Package com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers

Class BookController

java.lang.Object
com.vagsoft.bookstore.controllers.BookController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/books") @Validated(OrderedValidation.class) public class BookController extends Object
REST controller for endpoints related to books

    • getBooks

      @GetMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.data.domain.Page<BookReadDTO>> getBooks(@RequestParam(name="title",required=false) @Size(max=61,message="title must be less than 64 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Size(max=61,message="title must be less than 64 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) String title, @RequestParam(name="genre",required=false) @Size(max=31,message="genre must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Size(max=31,message="genre must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) String genre, @RequestParam(name="author",required=false) @Size(max=31,message="author must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) @Size(max=31,message="author must be less than 32 characters",groups=BasicValidation.class) String author, @RequestParam(name="description",required=false) @NullOrNotBlank(groups=BasicValidation.class) String description, @RequestParam(name="minPrice",required=false) @Min(value=0L,message="minPrice must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) @Min(value=0L,message="minPrice must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) Double minPrice, @RequestParam(name="maxPrice",required=false) @Min(value=0L,message="maxPrice must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) @Min(value=0L,message="maxPrice must be equal or greater than 0",groups=BasicValidation.class) Double maxPrice, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Retrieves a list of books filtered by the specified parameters
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the books to search for (optional)
      genre - the genre of the books to search for (optional)
      author - the author of the books to search for (optional)
      description - the description of the books to search for (optional)
      minPrice - the minimum price of the books to search for (optional)
      maxPrice - the maximum price of the books to search for (optional)
      pageable - the pagination information (optional)
      Returns:
      a page of books

    • addBook

      @IsAdmin @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BookReadDTO> addBook(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid BookWriteDTO bookWriteDTO)
      Adds a new book
      Parameters:
      bookWriteDTO - the book to be added
      Returns:
      the added book

    • getBookByID

      @GetMapping(path="/{bookID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BookReadDTO> getBookByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=BookRepository.class,message="Book with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer bookID)
      Retrieves a book by its ID
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the book to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the retrieved book

    • updateBookByID

      @IsAdmin @PutMapping(path="/{bookID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<BookReadDTO> updateBookByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=BookRepository.class,message="Book with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer bookID, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid BookUpdateDTO bookUpdateDTO)
      Updates a book by its ID with the given book information
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the book to be updated
      bookUpdateDTO - the new book information
      Returns:
      the updated book

    • deleteBookByID

      @IsAdmin @DeleteMapping(path="/{bookID}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> deleteBookByID(@PathVariable @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) @ExistsResource(repository=BookRepository.class,message="Book with given ID does not exist",groups=ExtendedValidation.class) @Positive(groups=BasicValidation.class) Integer bookID)
      Deletes a book by its ID
      Parameters:
      bookID - the ID of the book to be deleted
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity with no content
